title: Handsome Boy
author: Handsome Boy
content: I want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casino2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Handsome Boy on December 16, 2023, 01:04:04 AMI want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casino2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)You have two platforms to check the best casino to play with, Bitcointalk gambling announcement and casino reviewers like askgambler and casino.guru they will help you to discover casinos that meet your criteria, it should not be one casino reviewers check as many popular casino reviewers and compared their reviews, complaints and users' reviews and pick the one that's closest to your criteria.If this is your first time playing in a casino you must be a subscriber of these casino reviewers so you will learn how to look and what to look for in a casino, some criteria are missing from your list and these casino reviewers will give you what these are, and of course, you will also learn to review casinos based on how they present casinos in their list.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: It is very hard to get all the features in a single casino. Some may be offering it, but if the casino is not popular and not operating from many years, then I won’t recommend you to play there. I have been playing at stake.com from more than 5-6 years. They have great community support for their players. They have slot games and they offer great bonuses and rakebacks also. If you haven’t played there, then do give it a try. I am sure you won’t be disappointed.

comments.body: Quote from: Handsome Boy on December 16, 2023, 01:04:04 AMI want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casino2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)For 2,3, and, 4 that probably where it's get complicated especially regarding PvP considering this doesn't attract much in the long run even poker seems to be overlooked from time to time especially with the presence of bots nowadays. For 5 I think all casinos tend to have improved in this aspect but somehow depending on the network as well that you'll try to withdraw/deposit to when it comes to execution.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: I don't see there's a casino have all the criteria you mentioned above, but the closest one is Rollbit, they just don't have deposit bonus and free spins for new players. Rollbit has many PvP games, unlike other casinos who mostly only have slots, sports bookie and live casinos.If you're looking for deposit bonus and free spins for new players, you're taking risk to choose less reputable casino.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: Handsome Boy on December 16, 2023, 01:04:04 AMI want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casino2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)Good casinos exist but combining all these criteria in a single casino might be difficult to achieve, at least for the most popular ones. And if the unpopular ones and those who are just starting afresh would want to have them all in order to entice new customers in this competitive race, their credibility can't still be trusted.This is why I would advise you to go for Stake.com in this regard. The daily bonus might be the only issue here if I get correctly what you mean by that, but in all, you would have a wonderful experience and you get to have access to a lot of bonuses, cash/rakebacks and many more. Stake.com is a very popular casino and has also been here on BTCt for a long time and has a very good community and groups in other places as well.

You gotta dig into it yourself!  Look around at this board, read what others say compare stuff that matters to you.  Find one that clicks with what you want.  We ain't gonna hand-feed you everything.  But, if you got a particular question rattling around or need thoughts on something specific, feel free to ask.  just don’t expect us to do everything start to finish.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Why not try them out one after the other? I have a good time trying few casinos out when I was new to gambling, just to know which is good and which isn't, its your hard earned money, you are free to do anything you want, you don't have to follow what others tell you to do, start grabbing your own knowledge by yourself. The fact you aren't ready to hear about online casinos.1. You as a gambler can't have it all, all casinos don't pack all the goodies in one box ready for customers like you. 2. Daily bonuses don't run always, they are bonuses and that makes them time based, its only a matter of time until further notice. 3. Every casinos are created to make the house the winner, that's why you will see people losing money from a recommended casino where their friends are winning some money, never compare your luck to others. 4. Fast withdrawal is now very common, almost all the online exchanges I know don't take me time to withdraw from their platform, though the experience might be different if I am withdrawing five to six figures of money, I haven't win that much before.There is one thing you left out, how about KYC requirement, are you ready for this? Because if you win big you can be asked to tender your identity, are you ready for this?

comments.author: qwertyup23
comments.body: Quote from: Handsome Boy on December 16, 2023, 01:04:04 AMI want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casinoFor a genuine online casino, I recommend visiting the service section and search for any signature campaign that currently advertises a certain online gambling platform. To give you an example, here are some of the online gambling platforms that currently has a signature campaign:Duelbits;Rollbit;Fortune Jack;Roobet;Stake;Betcoin;... and many more. The reason on why I recommend these gambling websites is because the fact that the platform can avail the services of a signature campaign means that they can hold the funds for it, which speaks on how genuine these are.Quote2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)You can refer to any of the above-mentioned platforms for these games but for player vs player, I would definitely recommend trying out Rollbit's Duel Arena as it offers a unique twist on gambling! You can check YouTube videos for it and on how to play it.Quote5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)This is somehow difficult given that every casino has their respective ToS and withdrawal system. I cannot recommend you a specific casino about this but again, you can refer to the above-mentioned list for you to try it.At the end of the day, you can also visit their ANN thread if you have any query or questions about their platforms.Services board for you to check these gambling platforms: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=52.0

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: Handsome Boy on December 16, 2023, 01:04:04 AMI want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casino2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)A few threads have been created about these issues before so I think if you search this forum you will find the answer yourself. There are many casino sites in this forum that you can find on gaming boards and you can visit the association to check if there are any scam reports against them.  And here there is also topic created with list of casino sites you can get a big list from there. I can recommend you Rollbit and stake these two casinos are quite popular and from here you can blow up your funds fast. And get slots and roulette games. But since gambling is very risky, I would advise you not to deposit huge amounts and only do as much as you can afford to lose.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: Handsome Boy on December 16, 2023, 01:04:04 AMI want to play online casino which has the following criteria,1. of course not a scam online casino2. there are slots, roulette and versus (player vs player) games3. there are deposit bonuses and free spins for new players4. there is a daily bonus (points or free spins)5. easy and fast withdrawal process (doesn't have many rules)It is no secret that the forum is full of reliable casinos that respond to the conditions that the op wants, which I in turn find to be conditions that any casino wants to achieve in order to strengthen its position in a market with intense competition.  In this context, I would like to suggest to him two options that he can choose from:- Rollbit: A reliable platform that has proven its efficiency for a long time and enjoys the trust of the community.  You can enjoy the bonus and also enjoy the competitions that it runs from time to time.  One of the most powerful proofs of its integrity is that is currently running two signature campaigns managed by one of the most trusted managers on Bitcontalk.- Roobet: This is one of the most well-known gambling sites on the forum and has managed to have the best reputation compared to even older casinos.  All the conditions you are looking for are present in it, and I can assure you that you will be very satisfied with your experience with it.  He also runs a signature campaign for more than three years, which I had the opportunity to join and work with for more than two years.I hope I was able to help you with this information.  good luck
